description: '''Joseph Michael Poole''' (born August 12, 1976), better known by his stage name '''Wednesday 13''', is an American singer and musician. Apart from his solo career, he was the frontman of the [[horror punk]]/[[glam metal]] band [[Murderdolls]] and has also played in several other bands, including Maniac Spider Trash, [[Frankenstein Drag Queens from Planet 13]], Bourbon Crow, and Gunfire 76.
